participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, loves sharing experiences and helping others.
participant_1.background: I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants. I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date! I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time. I make music ask a year. I am always early.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and down-to-earth, enjoys simple pleasures and values health.
participant_2.background: I read fantasy fiction novels on a rainy day to escape the real world and immerse myself in another. I work at the deli counter. I drive my Prius to the beach to relax and enjoy the ocean. I work 60 hours a week. I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Hello, I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I'm doing alright, thanks. I just got back from the beach.
Oh, that sounds nice! I love the beach. Do you go often?
Not as often as I would like, but I try to go at least once a month.
That's great. I try to go at least once a week. I work at a deli counter, so I can usually sneak away for a little while.
Oh, cool! I've never worked in a deli before. What's it like?
It's pretty fun, actually. I get to meet a lot of people and I learn a lot about food.
That sounds like a great job. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! I do. What do you do for a living?
I'm a music teacher. I teach music lessons to kids.
Oh, that sounds fun! I'm always impressed by people who can play music.
Thanks! I've been playing music since I was a kid.
That's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
You should learn! It's really fun.
Maybe I will. I'm not very good at it though.
Don't worry, everyone starts out bad. Just keep practicing and you'll get better.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll definitely give it a try.
